title: Ep 117 | How Many Rednecks Does It Take to Change a Light Bulb?
description:
Jase kicks this one off with an embarrassing story about changing a bathroom light bulb for Missy. He also shares his household beverage problem and describes how a gaggle of surprise house guests reacted to his cellphone rules. Phil talks about what it means to live as children of the light and admits he has a cellphone exception. Phil, Al, Jase, and Zach take a deep dive into John 8:12. And Jase gets a kick out of googling "eternal light" and "biophotons."
